languages.text: "Как низко может пасть человек в погоне за властью... Ты правда так сильно меня ненавидел, Фелек?" {n}Рубиновые глаза Кассии наполняются кровавыми слезами, когда она всматривается в лицо предателя. Ваше сердце наполняется невыносимой тоской.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Как низко может пасть человек в погоне за властью... Ты правда так сильно меня ненавидел, Фелек?" {n}Рубиновые глаза Кассии наполняются кровавыми слезами, когда она всматривается в лицо предателя. Ваше сердце наполняется невыносимой тоской.{/n}

languages.text: "How low can a man sink in the pursuit of power... Is your hatred of me really so strong, Felek?" {n}Cassia's ruby eyes fill with bloody tears as she looks the traitor in the face, and your heart is wracked by unbearable grief.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Как низко может пасть человек в погоне за властью... Ты правда так сильно меня ненавидел, Фелек?" {n}Рубиновые глаза Кассии наполняются кровавыми слезами, когда она всматривается в лицо предателя. Ваше сердце наполняется невыносимой тоской.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "How low can a man sink in the pursuit of power... Have you really hated me so badly, Felek?" {n}Cassia's ruby eyes fill with bloody tears when she looks in the traitor's face, and your heart is wracked by an unbearable grief.{/n}

"How low can a man sink in the pursuit of power... Have you really hated me so badly, Felek?" {n}Cassia's ruby eyes fill with bloody tears when she looks in the traitor's face, and your heart is wracked by an unbearable grief.{/n}

"How low can a man sink in the pursuit of power... Is your hatred of me really so strong, Felek?" {n}Cassia's ruby eyes fill with bloody tears as she looks the traitor in the face, and your heart is wracked by unbearable grief.{/n}

"How low can a man sink in the pursuit of power... Is your hatred of me really so strong, Felek?" {n}Cassia's ruby eyes fill with bloody tears as she looks the traitor in the face, and your heart is wracked by unbearable grief.{/n}

"How low can a man sink in the pursuit of power... Is your hatred of me really so strong, Felek?" {n}Cassia's ruby eyes fill with bloody tears as she looks the traitor in the face, and your heart is wracked by unbearable grief.{/n}

languages.text: “为了追求权力，人可以堕落到什么样的地步？你真的这么痛恨我吗，费雷克？”{n}卡西娅红宝石般的双眼中噙满了血红色的泪水。她看着那个叛徒的脸，你感觉心中充满了难以承受的哀痛。{/n}
languages.original_text: "How low can a man sink in the pursuit of power... Is your hatred of me really so strong, Felek?" {n}Cassia's ruby eyes fill with bloody tears as she looks the traitor in the face, and your heart is wracked by unbearable grief.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “为了追求权力，人可以堕落到什么样的地步？你真的这么痛恨我吗，费雷克？”{n}卡西娅红宝石般的双眼中噙满了血红色的泪水。她看着那个叛徒的脸，你感觉心中充满了难以承受的哀痛。{/n}

languages.text: «Qué bajo puede caer un hombre en sus ansias de poder... ¿de verdad me odias tanto, Felek?». {n}Los ojos rubíes de Cassia se llenan de lágrimas sangrientas mientras mira fijamente al traidor, y una pena insoportable invade tu corazón.{/n}
languages.original_text: "How low can a man sink in the pursuit of power... Is your hatred of me really so strong, Felek?" {n}Cassia's ruby eyes fill with bloody tears as she looks the traitor in the face, and your heart is wracked by unbearable grief.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Qué bajo puede caer un hombre en sus ansias de poder... ¿de verdad me odias tanto, Felek?». {n}Los ojos rubíes de Cassia se llenan de lágrimas sangrientas mientras mira fijamente al traidor, y una pena insoportable invade tu corazón.{/n}

languages.text: 「力欲しさに、そこまで堕ちてしまうなんて…。そんなにあたくしが憎いのですか、フェレック？」{n}カシアの緋色の目が、裏切り者を目にした途端に血の涙で溢れ、あなたの心には耐えがたい悲しみが流れ込んでくる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "How low can a man sink in the pursuit of power... Is your hatred of me really so strong, Felek?" {n}Cassia's ruby eyes fill with bloody tears as she looks the traitor in the face, and your heart is wracked by unbearable grief.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「力欲しさに、そこまで恥ずべきことができるなんて…。そんなに私が憎いのですか、フェレック？」{n}カシアが持つ紅玉の目が、裏切り者を目にした途端に血の涙でいっぱいになり、あなたの心には耐えがたい悲しみが流れ込んでくる。{/n}
「力欲しさに、そこまで堕ちてしまうなんて…。そんなにあたくしが憎いのですか、フェレック？」{n}カシアの緋色の目が、裏切り者を目にした途端に血の涙で溢れ、あなたの心には耐えがたい悲しみが流れ込んでくる。{/n}

languages.text: « Comment un homme peut-il tomber si bas en quête de pouvoir... Vous me haïssez donc tant que ça, Felek ? » {n}Les yeux rubis de Cassia s'emplissent de larmes de sang tandis qu'elle regarde fixement le traître, et un chagrin insoutenable s'empare de votre cœur.{/n}
languages.original_text: "How low can a man sink in the pursuit of power... Is your hatred of me really so strong, Felek?" {n}Cassia's ruby eyes fill with bloody tears as she looks the traitor in the face, and your heart is wracked by unbearable grief.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Comment un homme peut-il tomber si bas en quête de pouvoir... Vous me haïssez donc tant que ça, Felek ? » {n}Les yeux rubis de Cassia s'emplissent de larmes de sang tandis qu'elle regarde fixement le traître, et un chagrin insoutenable s'empare de votre cœur.{/n}

languages.text: "Wie tief kann ein Mann in seinem Machtstreben sinken ...? Ist Euer Hass auf mich wirklich so groß, Felek?" {n}Cassias Rubinaugen füllen sich mit blutigen Tränen, als sie dem Verräter ins Gesicht blickt, und dein Herz wird von unerträglichem Kummer ergriffen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "How low can a man sink in the pursuit of power... Is your hatred of me really so strong, Felek?" {n}Cassia's ruby eyes fill with bloody tears as she looks the traitor in the face, and your heart is wracked by unbearable grief.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wie tief kann ein Mann in seinem Machtstreben sinken ...? Ist Euer Hass auf mich wirklich so groß, Felek?" {n}Cassias Rubinaugen füllen sich mit blutigen Tränen, als sie dem Verräter ins Gesicht blickt, und dein Herz wird von unerträglichem Kummer ergriffen.{/n}

languages.original_text: "How low can a man sink in the pursuit of power... Is your hatred of me really so strong, Felek?" {n}Cassia's ruby eyes fill with bloody tears as she looks the traitor in the face, and your heart is wracked by unbearable grief.{/n}

languages.text: "Bir insan, güç arzusu için ne kadar alçalabilir? Bana olan nefretin o kadar mı güçlü Felek?" {n}Cassia'nın hainin yüzüne bakan yakut gözleri, kanlı gözyaşlarıyla doluyor. Bunun üzerine kalbin, tarifsiz bir keder altında eziliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "How low can a man sink in the pursuit of power... Is your hatred of me really so strong, Felek?" {n}Cassia's ruby eyes fill with bloody tears as she looks the traitor in the face, and your heart is wracked by unbearable grief.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bir insan, güç arzusu için ne kadar alçalabilir? Bana olan nefretin o kadar mı güçlü Felek?" {n}Cassia'nın hainin yüzüne bakan yakut gözleri, kanlı gözyaşlarıyla doluyor. Bunun üzerine kalbin, tarifsiz bir keder altında eziliyor.{/n}
